author: Daniel Greene
description:
Get 25% off on Paired premium! Start your 7-day free trial by clicking the link here: https://www.paired.com/daniel25 In this review, I take a critical look at The Dollmaker by Lynn B., a psychological thriller that promised an eerie and suspenseful ride but didn’t quite deliver. From underdeveloped characters to a plot that struggled to maintain tension, I break down what worked, what didn’t, and whether this book is worth your time. If you’ve read The Dollmaker, let me know your thoughts in the comments—did it fall flat for you too, or did you find something to love?
